docsPage.title: Documentation
docsPage.subtitle: Comprehensive guide to the Sandbox Console

apiKeys.description: Manage, create, and revoke your API keys for different applications.

usage.title: Usage
usage.subtitle: Aggregate request volume across all keys for the last 24 hours

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your preferences and account-wide options

about.intro1: Hello! I'm Sil van Diepen, a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies and a keen eye for design.
about.intro2: I specialize in creating developer tools that are both powerful and delightful to use. This Sandbox Console demonstrates my approach to developer tooling.
about.projectDesc: The Sandbox Console showcases modern web development practices and demonstrates my approach to building developer-facing tools. It features:

feature.reactTs: React 19 with TypeScript for type safety
feature.bemScss: BEM methodology with SCSS for maintainable styles
feature.mockData: Mock data services and local storage

about.familyDesc1: Beyond the code, I’m a family-driven person who values time spent with loved ones.
about.familyDesc2: Outside of work I enjoy exploring new tech, photography, and deep dives into design systems and typography.
about.familyDesc3: Also passionate about cooking and travel.
about.contactDesc: I'm always interested in collaborating on exciting projects or discussing new opportunities.

tech.reactDesc: Modern architecture, concurrent features, and strong composition patterns.
tech.typescriptDesc: Typed components, stricter props, and safer refactors.
tech.viteDesc: Fast dev server, optimized builds, and modern ESM tooling.
tech.i18nDesc: Multi-language UI with runtime language switcher.
tech.chartsDesc: Usage charts with responsive, theme-aware styling.
tech.routerDesc: Client-side routing with transitions and layout handling.
tech.eslintDesc: Consistent code style and quality checks.
tech.sassDesc: Design tokens, BEM, and theming with CSS custom properties.
tech.iconsDesc: Lightweight SVG icons loaded on demand.
tech.bemmDesc: Utility for BEM class naming and modifiers.

dev.title: Dev Tools
dev.themeDesc: Preview light or dark theme to validate contrast, spacing, and component states.
dev.featureFlagsDesc: Toggle optional UI behaviors to simulate different product configurations.
dev.languageDesc: Switch the interface language to test i18n coverage and layout.

form.title: Title
form.descriptionHelp: Short note about what this key will be used for.
form.revokedCannotEdit: This key is revoked and cannot be edited.

modal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This cannot be undone.
modal.revealDesc: This key is only shown once. Please store it securely now.
modal.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke "{{title}}"? This cannot be undone.

toast.missingTitleMsg: Please enter a title before generating an API key.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor your API usage and manage your keys

actions.createKeyDesc: Generate a new API key for your applications
actions.viewUsageDesc: Check detailed statistics and performance metrics
actions.readDocsDesc: Learn how to use the API and integrations
actions.getStartedDesc: Quick guide to start using the API

recentKeys.title: Recent API Keys
recentKeys.empty: No API keys yet. Create your first key to get started.
